properties.Observatio: Water source is located in glanore GND. Although water spring has been developed, water is leaking from the stock tank. This area may be about  0.5 acre of which about 10% are large trees.
properties.Descriptio:

properties.Observatio: This water source is difficult to reach. Although it is a well-functioning water scheme, there is no water filtering system here.

properties.Observatio: This is a well-developed and well-functioning water scheme. Villagers are requesting that a concrete dam be built across the water stream as the water level decreasing the dry season.
